text: Gokalpur is a village in Kapurthala district of Punjab State, India. It is located from Kapurthala, which is both district and sub-district headquarters of Gokalpur. The village is administrated by a Sarpanch, who is an elected representative. == Demography == According to the report published by Census India in 2011, Gokalpur has total number of 7 houses and population of 39 of which include 20 males and 19 females. Literacy rate of Gokalpur is 62.86%, lower than state average of 75.84%. The population of children under the age of 6 years is 4 which is 10.26% of total population of Gokalpur, and child sex ratio is approximately 1000, higher than state average of 846. == Population data == {|class="wikitable sortable" !
